data.name: Vulpera
data.description:
The Horde - Vulpera [E]
Units:
+5% damage
+5% evasion

Buildings:
+10% attack speed

Upgrades:
+3 Lv Ranged Weapons
Mana Stone's cost and MP given is halved

Magic:
Living Flames Potion (10 dmg/s for 20s to 1 unit)
Weird Stuff (Random buff to an ally)
Fire Wave (Deals 125 dmg in a line)

Traits: Vulpera are a race based on pace, if they can overtake opponents in strength and amount of gold, they will become a very serious opponent. Vulpera love to hoard gold and have plenty to spend it on. The troops, although not very strong, have many tricks to gain an advantage, especially defending the base and crushing the sidelines.

Difficulty: Advanced
Created: by Ksay

auras.name: Mana Leak Aura
auras.description:
-10 MP/sec regeneration
(affects non-Hero units only)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: True Aim Aura
auras.description:
+20% ranged unit and structure damage
(2500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Flame Attack
auras.description:
+100 building range
Towers and Barracks gain splash

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Vulpera Asassins [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Tricky

Vulpera Asassins replaces Scavenger
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Vampirism (Passive Spell)
(steals life equal to 20% of damage dealt)
Poisoned Daggers (Orb Effect)
(deals 6 dmg/s for 10 sec)
Upgrades used:
Vulper Knifes
Vulpera Armor
Finders Keepers
Tricky
Cleaving Attack
Spare Potion

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Vulpera Snipers [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Fast Paws

Vulpera Snipers replaces Ranger
Ranged Unit
+75 HP
+150 range
Abilities:
Rapidshot (Self Spell)
(+80% AS and -40% armor)
Special Training (Passive Skill)
(10% to deal 2x damage)
(The damage from Tricky upgrade is doubled)
Upgrades used:
Vulper Bow
Vulper Armor
Fast Paws
Tricky
Spare Potion

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Divine Golem [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Cleaving Attack

Divine Golem replaces Fire Tail
Siege Unit (Melee)
+60% attack rate
+600 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:
Overcharge (Self Spell)
(+250% attack rate for 5 seconds)
Stomp (Disable Spell)
(stuns enemies in 200 AoE for 3s)
(1s duration on Heroes)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Vulpera Bow
Vulper Armor
Cleaving Attack
Out in the Wilds

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Hide in the Sands! [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Pounce
+1 level of Spare Potion

Reduces spell damage to Scavenger, Ranger, Vulpera Ð¡hemist, Rider and Hyena Rider by 20% and increases HP by 25 and 2 armor. Your units become invisible.

Type: Anti Magic Damage / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Triceratop [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Out in the Wilds

Triceratop replaces Vulture
Air Unit (Melee/Ground)
+15% attack rate
+300 HP
+3 armor
Abilities:
Immolation (Damage Spell)
(18 dmg/s in 150 AoE)
Adaptation (Self Spell)
(Restore full HP when below 30% HP)
Upgrades used:
Potion Mastery
Vulpera Armor
Out in the Wilds

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Cunning Plans

Icreases Vulpera Town and Vulpera Ð¡hemist mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Vulpera Town spells by 30%|r

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.description:
Gives:
+12 Vulpera Ð¡hemist damage
-10% Vulpera Ð¡hemist spell cooldown
Living Flames Potion +5 damage
Questionable Medicine +2% attack rate, +20 HP, +2.5% damage, -1 armor and -20 damage
Fire Wave +25 damage

upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Vulpera Town mana reg

upgrades.name: Magic Torrent
upgrades.description:
Gives:
Arrow Voley
+70 AoE
Living Sands
+1000 AoE

bonuses.name: Eudora [Q]
bonuses.description:
Eudora replaces Nisha

Hero Unit (Melee)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Feed the Fish (Economy Boost)
kills an enemy, gains 20-110 extra Gold
(affects non-Hero units only)
(30 second cooldown)

Heave Ho! (Self Spell)
100% chance to dodge an attack for 4-10 sec
(24-30 second cooldown)

Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
27-45% to do 4x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Make Yer Choice Skallywag! (???)
You can choose Eudora's 4th ability

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Altar of Gold [C]
bonuses.description:
Our scouts have discovered this ancient Altar on one of their missions. It seems it demands some rituals to be completed in order to power up. We are sure if we complete all the rituals, the reward for our efforts will be mighty worth it...

Type: Unique Bonus / Economy Boost

spells.name: The Rituals
spells.description:
There are 4 ways to earn the favor of the Altar of Gold. In order to do it you have to complete either of 4 available questlines.

For completing the quests, you get 400/600/800/1000 Gold accordingly. Once you complete the questline, you get a specific reward. Can only get 1 such reward

Type: Unique Bonus / Economy Boost

spells.name: Killing Spree
spells.description:
You have to kill enemy Heroes/Special Units in certain amounts.

Reward: Ability to summon Golden Gargantuan

spells.name: Minion Massacre
spells.description:
You have to kill enough enemy non-Hero units.

Reward: Gain access to 3 extra levels of 3 main unit stats upgrades. +10% spawn rate of barracks.

spells.name: Upgrades People
spells.description:
You have to research certain upgrades in both main building and towers.

Reward: Unlock all 4 tower upgrades

spells.name: Gathering Levels
spells.description:
You need to get higher levels for your Heroes.

Reward: Gain a random tier 4 Artefact every 5 minutes. Works only on Heroes present on the map.

spells.name: Reroll Quest
spells.description:
Pay 500 Gold to gain a new Quest. Can't get the same Quest.
(30 sec cooldown)

bonuses.name: Vixen Diplomacy [X]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Careful Investments

Spawn 1 Vulpera Caravan every 2 wave
Vulpera Caravan is a melee unit and has Supplies ability which grants 1 random item to allies every 60 seconds. (Supplies upgrades with magic)
It has A Fair Trade ability, which gives 30 Gold to the killer and 20 Gold to you. You can use Good Business ability in your bonus building.

Type: Early Push / Economy Boost

spells.name: Vixen Diplomacy
spells.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Careful Investments

Spawn 1 Vulpera Caravan every 2 wave
Vulpera Caravan is a melee unit and has Supplies ability which grants 1 random item to allies every 60 seconds. (Supplies upgrades with magic)
It has A Fair Trade ability, which gives 30 Gold to the killer and 20 Gold to you. You can use Good Business ability in your bonus building.

Type: Early Push / Economy Boost

spells.name: Good Business
spells.description:
Choose an enemy Hero or Special Unit
Sell a random tier 1 item to them
The player who buys the item this way loses 200 Gold, while you gain 200 Gold
(180 second cooldown)
(You can't target your own Heroes or Special Unit)

bonuses.name: Arksay [W]
bonuses.description:
Arksay replaces Jenoth

Hero Unit (Range)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Hybrid (Summoner/Disabler)

Can learn:
A Small Contract (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Hellhounds for 12-18 seconds
(45 second cooldown)

Dark Portal (Summoning Spell)
summons a random Void every 5s. Lasts 30-60s
(60-90 second cooldown)

Void Grip Aura (Disable Aura)
9-15% attack, move slow
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Siphoning Life (Damage Spell)
drains 1000-7000 HP over 8 seconds
(affects Heroes only)
(90 second cooldown)

Type: Hero Power

bonuses.name: Worg Riders [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Finders Keepers

Worg Riders replaces Hyena Rider
Siege Unit
+2 armor
+125 HP
Abilities:
Spell Resistance (Passive Skill)
(20% spell damage reduction)
Healing Potion (Healing Spell)
(Heals 100 HP over 10s)
Upgrades used:
Vulper Knifes
Vulpera Armor
Finders Keepers
Pounce
Cleaving Attack
Spare Potion

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

towerUpgrades.name: Out in the Wilds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus dmg and attack rate, heal
Affects: Vulture, Fire Tail
(Heals when they pass any neutral building)

Lv1: +10 dmg, +5% attack rate, restores 25% HP
Lv2: +20 dmg, +10% attack rate, restores 50% HP
Lv3: +30 dmg, +15% attack rate, restores 75% HP
Lv4: +40 dmg, +20% attack rate, restores 100% HP

towerUpgrades.name: Pounce
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to dismount instead of dying
Affects: Hyena Rider

Lv1: 10%, has Savings (gives gold upon dying)
(deals 8/16/24/32 gold when this unit dies)
Lv2: 20%, has Bleed (reduce unit's speed)
(15%/30%/45% chance, -25% speed for 60 sec)
Lv3: 30%, has Inspiration Aura (damage aura)
(10%/20% damage bonus)
Lv4: 40%, has Serpent Ward (summons a unit)
(Summons a Serpent Ward)

towerUpgrades.name: Careful Investments
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate, late game power
Affects: Your Buildings

Lv1: +10% attack rate, +1 Mana Stone upgrade
Lv2: +20% attack rate +2 Mana Stone upgrade
Lv3: +30% attack rate +3 Mana Stone upgrade
Lv4: +40% attack rate +4 Mana Stone upgrade

towerUpgrades.name: Spare Potion
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: self-healing ability
Affects: Scavenger, Ranger, Chemist, Riders

Lv1: restores 40 HP
Lv2: restores 80 HP
Lv3: restores 120 HP
Lv4: restores 160 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Cleaving Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage on each attack
Affects: Scavenger, Hyena Rider

Lv1: 8% to do 20 damage in 200 AoE
Lv2: 16% to do 30 damage in 200 AoE
Lv3: 24% to do 40 damage in 200 AoE
Lv4: 32% to do 50 damage in 200 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Tricky
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Scavenger, Ranger

Lv1: 10% to do 1.75x extra dmg
Lv2: 20% to do 2x extra dmg
Lv3: 30% to do 2.25Ñ extra dmg
Lv4: 40% to do 2.5x extra dmg

towerUpgrades.name: Fast Paws
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to attack twice
Affects: Vulpera Ranger, Vulpera Tower

Lv1: 8% chance
Lv2: 16% chance
Lv3: 24% chance
Lv4: 32% chance

towerUpgrades.name: Finders Keepers
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to steal gold on kill, increased dmg
Affects: Scavenger, Hyenas Rider
(Type -rob to see how much Gold you stole)

Lv1: 3 Gold per kill, +2 dmg
Lv2: 6 Gold per kill, +4 dmg
Lv3: 9 Gold per kill, +6 dmg
Lv4: 12 Gold per kill, +8 dmg

towerUpgrades.name: Cunning Plans
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: side-lane power, army power
Affects: Neutral buildings
(Neutral buildings grant double effect to you)

Lv1: spawn a random unit every 80 seconds
Lv2: spawn a random unit every 65 seconds
Lv3: spawn a random unit every 50 seconds
Lv4: spawn a random unit every 35 seconds

t1spell.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Living Sands [X]
t2spell.description:
Creates Sands Aura over your base
Deals 70 damage/sec for 18s.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: Snake Charmer
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Disabler

Can learn:
Fire Grenade (Damage Spell)
Deals 175-325 dmg in 225-325 AoE
(30 second cooldown)

Dreaming Potion (Disable Spell)
disables for 8-20s
(affects organic Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
(33-45 second cooldown)

Frost Missile (Orb Effect)
9-15% attack, move slow
(affects organic units only)

King Cobra (Summoning Spell)
Summons a Grand Serpent for 30-60 sec
(60-90 second cooldown)

skills.name: Frost Nova - [Level 4]
skills.description: Blasts enemy units with a wave of frost that deals <AUfn,DataB4> damage to the target, and <AUfn,DataA4> nova damage. Cold damage slows units' movement and attack rate for <AUfn,Dur4> seconds.

skills.name: Sleep - [Level 4]
skills.description: Puts a target enemy unit to sleep for <AUsl,Dur4> seconds. A sleeping unit can be awoken by attacking it.

skills.name: Frost Missile - [Level 1]
skills.description: Slows target by 6%.

skills.name: Elemental Warriors - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Elemental Warriors for 18 seconds.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Assassin

Can learn:
Fan of Knives (Orb Effect)
15-27% for 150 area damage
(350 area of effect)

Regeneration (Self Spell)
500-2000 HP over 10s, 10-22 bonus HP/s for 15-33s
(45 second cooldown)

Critical Strike (Passive Skill)
27-45% to do 4x damage
(affects Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Fan of Knives (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage
(350-500 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

skills.name: Charged Blades - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives a 15% chance to deal 150 area damage.

skills.name: Regeneration - [Level 1]
skills.description: Heals 500 hit points over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Critical Strike - [Level 4]
skills.description: Gives a 27% chance to do 4 times normal damage on an attack.

skills.name: Fan of Knives - [Level 4]
skills.description: Hurls a flurry of knives, damaging nearby enemies. Each knife does 225 damage.

heroes.name: Caravan Leader
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

500-800 HP to 3-9 unit over 5s

(40 second cooldown)

revives 4-10 dead units
(60-120 second cooldown)

skills.name: Rejuvenation - [Level 1]

skills.name: Devotion Aura - [Level 4]
